articles.title: Trump is eyeing the UAE as a hub for AI expansion. Here's why.

articles.summary: The United Arab Emirates wants to become an AI leader by 2031. It's leveraging its oil wealth to attract new talent and fund new research initiatives. The UAE participated in the most lucrative funding round in Silicon Valley history: the $6.6 billion deal closed by OpenAI. Omar Sultan Al Olama was appointed as the country's AI Minister in 2017. Private investment in AI technology in 2023 totaled $67.2 billion and $7.8 billion.

articles.title: A New Headache for Honest Students: Proving They Didn't Use A.I.
articles.summary: Leigh Burrell, 23, received a zero on an assignment worth 15 percent of her final grade in a required writing course. Her professor suspected she had outsourced the composition of her paper to an A.I. chatbot. According to Google Docs editing history, she had drafted and revised the assignment over the course of two days. Her grade was restored after she sent a 15-page PDF of time-stamped screenshots and notes from her writing process to the chair of her English department.

During disasters, they often share photos, videos, short messages and even their location. This creates a huge network of real-time information. Artificial intelligence helps to sort this information and classifies it by urgency.

AI in infection diagnostics can detect infections faster and more accurately than customary methods. Clinicians need to actively engage in the AI revolution.
